[getMode()](./obsidian-typings.embeddededitorview.getmode.md)

</td><td>

[onunload()](./obsidian-typings.embeddededitorview.onunload.md)

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

[showEditor()](./obsidian-typings.embeddededitorview.showeditor.md)

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[showPreview(save)](./obsidian-typings.embeddededitorview.showpreview.md)

</td><td>

Reveal preview mode and destroy editor, save if specified.

</td></tr>

[showSearch(replace)](./obsidian-typings.embeddededitorview.showsearch.md)

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[toggleMode()](./obsidian-typings.embeddededitorview.togglemode.md)

</td><td>
